Nazza is a girl with medium length dark brown hair that comes down to the bottom of her shoulder blades. She has pale green eyes and an F-cup chest. Nazza stands at about 5'6" and looks to be about 26 years old. (picture here: http://i716.photobucket.com/albums/ww164...)

Quite slim and very attractive, wearing azure tube shirt that shows her cleavage and belly button and an azure mini skirt that match with her azure ballet flats. She has long maroon hair that goes down on her back with bangs between her emerald eyes. Often friendly and mischievous, but gets easily angered when people try to look up her skirt. 11.content: Elita was sitting in her dorm room studying for a while. She shared a room with Nazza, but she was out just now. For the time being Elita wagged her tail contentedly and breathed a little ice into her drink to keep it chilled. Of the dragon-like people she was one of the few she knew of that had frost breath abilities. Of course, there weren't just dragon-like people, Nazza was a human and there were a vast variety of furs and other species too.
11.title: Elita

114.content:
It was a rather uneventful day for Elita. While she was studying in her dorm as usual, but she was getting quite bored. Not much later, Elita began to feel her wings cramping up from being pressed against the back of the chair for so long. Sighing, the dragoness decided to take a quick break form her studies. Standing up, Elita stretched out her violet wings and allowed them to spread across almost the half the room.

As Elita began to turn around, however, her wings accidentally knocked into Nazza's shelf of potions. While her human roommate didn't have any special powers like her, Nazza was a genius when it came to using the potion-mixing machine. The device worked by combining all sorts of various chemicals together and fusing them into a liquid form with a powerful electrical charge. Nazza was able to use it make potions to do just about anything, and always kept a few bottles of her favorite ones on the shelf in her room. As Elita's wing slapped the shelf, the entire thing began to shake. Within mere moments, Elita found herself soaked by several of the potions that fell from the shelf.

Before Elita could even react to the mysterious mixture, she felt a bizarre tingling sensation flowing through her entire body. She didn't even know what was happening at first, but soon she realized the reality of her situation: the mixture of so many different potions falling on her at once was causing her body to grow at an alarming rate! Elita immediately ran to her dorm room's window and jumped outside, using her wings to land safely after leaping from the 3rd floor of the building.

As soon as she was outside, Elita's growth rate exploded. She was growing entire feet by the second, and by the time the worried dragoness finally stopped growing, she had reached an amazing height of...
114.title: A growing dragoness

12.content: Nazza giggled slightly as she held the device in her hand, it was one of those magitech devices that she'd heard the occasional rumour about. She wasn't sure how to properly operate it yet, what she needed was a test subject. But what kind of device was it that she had and whom or what should she try it on? Nazza looked around the university grounds, there were some humans, some furries and some other species that didn't fall into either category. Okay, so the test subjects were varied enough as were the possibilities of what this device could be.
12.title: Nazza

121.content:
Nazza fiddled about with the two objects, trying to get them to work, but nothing happened even when she put both of them on. After a while of walking she ended up back at her dorm room that she shared with Elita.
"Um, uh...hello Nazza." The other girl timidly spoke. "What's that you've got?" She asked.
"Remember when I mentioned about magitech devices a few months back?" Nazza enquired, the dragon girl nodded. "Well, this is them...only, I can't get them to work. I've tried putting it on, but there's no response to either one. I think this one goes around your wrist and the other one is worn like some sort of collar." She explained.
"I'm not going to ask where you found them or how you got hold of them." Elita mentioned.
"Hey, what's that meant to imply? It's not like I went up and stole them from anyone." Nazza frowned.
"S...sorry Naz-chan." Elita apologised. Nazza sighed.
"You apologise for everything way too much you know." Nazza spoke.
"Sorry Naz..." Elita begun but was interrupted by a sigh from Nazza and then the two looked at each other and giggled.
"Do you want a hand, figuring it out?" Elita asked.
121.title: Elita, her shy dragoness room mate

1211.content:
Nazza tried fiddling with the bracelet. It seemed to have some kind of shifter on it, she turned it and a few seconds later she heard Elita's voice.
"Hey, it won't come off." Nazza shifted it the other direction and Elita finally pulled it free. "Phew, that was close...I thought it was stuck around my neck for a moment."
"Hmm...It never locked when I was playing about with it earlier. Maybe it can't lock around the person using the bracelet." Nazza surmised. "Could you put it back on for me Elita?" She asked.
"Fine Naz-chan." Elita sighed with a light blush as she placed the collar back around her neck. Nazza immediately locked it and noticed a light that flickered as if registering data or something.
"Now how do I do this?" Nazza muttered, toying with the device. Elita looked a little concerned.
1211.title: Nazza has the control bracelet

Nazza tries to restore herself and Elita
12111.content: Nazza felt her clothes start to get a little tighter and her buttons popped out of place as her clothing ripped at the seams and she sat in the room at twice her original height, now 11' tall. She was now scrunched up in the dorm room and felt something wriggling about under her foot that had ripped free from Nazza's sock. Down by her feet were a pile of Elita's clothes and Nazza smirked a little as she put her feet down either side of the squirming object. To Nazza, the shrunken figure looked about 15-16", but in truth Elita had shrunk to half her height and was about 2' 7 or 8" tall. It would've been better if she could've had her clothes grow with her, but it was fun to play around with the tiny girl at her feet. Elita probably had no idea what was going on as Nazza rubbed one foot casually across the top of the smaller girl's squirming dress.
12111.title: Nazza gets bigger

choices: Steals half of Elita's bust size
Sets clothes to shrink/grow with targets and leads Elita into an open space
12113.content:
When Nazza fiddled about with the device enough she managed to get a holographic display to pop up from the bracelet. It was a list of instructions on how the bracelet could be used, even as a means to swap a male and females anatomic sizes to switch genders. Clothes could be shrunk or grown with the people if a certain option was selected and other features were available, changing the sizes of specific body parts. A woman could effectively steal another woman's bust if she so desired, though she wouldn't be able to steal the bust of a male unless they had a big enough pair of man boobs. It was funny though, because it was possible to give a man a bust and still keep yours providing it was big enough. Everything was percentage based, you lost a percentage, they gained a percentage and vice-versa. Aside from that, the only other thing was a note on the locking. The device could be locked around a person to prevent them from removing it, in fact the device wouldn't operate without being locked. This allowed for a registration of the participant since the bracelet shouldn't be removed during shrink or growth. If the participant was too small to see the collar could be resized to fit them and transported to their location. The bracelet always locks to the wielder when in use so there is no issue regarding the control bracelet.
"Hmm...interesting." Nazza mused. "Let's see..."
12113.title: How to use the control bracelet

153.content:
Kenny was alone in the chemistry lab of his school. Considered a "quiet prodigy" by many, it was perfectly understandable that he wished to work alone, and people were used to letting him have the lab on his own. Of course, some of this work could have been done at home, but his home lab was, unfortunately, not as well equipped as the one he was located now. He had been working on this project for months, almost a year even. Experiments had been tough, and it hadn't been a few times that things went wrong and he had almost injured himself. But finally, the moment he had been waiting for had come. It was complete. The teen raised a silver ring that held a crimson gem. He inspected it from each side, almost momentarily mesmerized by the glow of the gem.

"Mass...chanelling the energies around us using a focal point, this ring specifically, the power one could obtain over mass is near infinite. Making something heavier or lighter, or making something bigger or smaller...all those would be simple tasks with some practice. And the time for practice has come!"

The teen was elated and he finally put the ring in the index finger of his left hand. He knew that he had to establish physical contact with the object he wanted to affect, so he proceeded to touch a chair. He closed his eyes, concentrated and focused on what he wanted to happen. Then, with a brief crimson flash, right before his eyes, the chair became smaller, as if it was a toy.

"It's alive!!!!! Well....okay, wrong exclamation, but the point was made" he chuckled and lifted the chair. He then tried to destroy it in various ways, but it proved very difficult. It had become much more durable, just as he had predicted.

"I wonder how it would work on something alive though....."

He cleaned the mess of the lab a bit, hid the small chair and left the lab, looking for a willing (or not) test subject. Little did he know that fate is a whimsical mistress, and he might be the one who would be tasting the fruits of his hard work....
153.title: Kenny

info.brief_description: Science reaches the breakthrough that spiritual energy and magic are explainable.
info.description: This is a story involving the people I know of who are into growth and shrink fantasies. The story is set in an alternate Earth where science discovered how magic and spiritual energy functioned. Not everyone in the world knows the truth about magic, but those who do have managed to craft magitech devices that allow them to harness the power of magic for their own benefit. This story follows one of the people I know and their encounter with such a device or devices that were designed with specific ideas in mind. (please try and keep in the theme of shrinking/growth or transformation and stick to the purpose that a device has once it is in place)
